body: You either carry or have memorized a sacred text from your school, temple, or monastery, and its wisdom gives you insight that makes your attacks more devastating. You gain a +2 trait bonus on rolls to confirm critical hits when you're using an unarmed strike or monk weapon.
name: Martial Manuscript
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Faith Traits/Martial Manuscript
